  • @mixin footer {
  @include flexbox($wrap: wrap, $justify-content: center);
  
  article {
    // Align to flex end and stretch 
    @include flexbox($direction: column, $justify-content: flex-end, $align-items: baseline);
    
    ul, aside {
      @include flex-item($align-self: stretch);
    }
    
    
    @include thumb;
    width: 480px;
    height: 320px;
    
    &#contact {
      @include contact;
    }
    
    &#navigation {
      @include navigation;
    }
  }
}
